page.title: 03The Duncombe's Manor (cont.)
page.content: church warden.There is the Rector's warden and the people's warden at the church.Sir Phillip is the Rector's warden.His duties are making sure all the lights are on and the right hymn books are out.Silver must be clean and he also has to make sure the church as a whole is in good order.Also he helps select a new Rector.On the old houses there is a{PD}written.These houses were built at the time of Sir Phillip's Great Grandfather round about 1820-80,and would have belonged to him and been used as estate houses.In the graveyard by the church there are only three Duncombe graves showing.These are Sir Phillip's Great Grandfather, Grandfather and Father.There are more but they are so old you can't read the writing.
